lead_paragraph: Scott Sharp, the Indy Racing League’s leader in career starts (129), is joining Rahal Letterman Racing, which lost Danica Patrick to Andretti Green Racing. Jeff Simmons is the team’s other driver.
snippet: Scott Sharp, the Indy Racing League’s leader in career starts (129), is joining Rahal Letterman Racing, which lost Danica Patrick to Andretti Green Racing. Jeff Simmons is the team’s other driver.
